```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(fixest)
library(vtable)
```


```{r}
graph_data <- trends_data %>% group_by(monthorweek, high_income) %>% summarize(mean(index))

ggplot(graph_data, aes(x = monthorweek, y = `mean(index)`, color = high_income)) + geom_point() + geom_line() + geom_vline(xintercept = as.Date("2015-09-01")) + geom_smooth(method = 'lm')
```
```{r}
model1 <- feols(index ~ high_income + scorecard_exist, data = trends_data)
etable(model1)
```
